title: Tekken 8 - How to Unlock the Secret Ending (And the Trophy)
description:
SPOILER WARNING!

Tekken 8 has a really cool story mode called The Dark Awakens that follows Jin in the battle against his father, Kazuya, and we really enjoyed the ending. But we also noticed that in the Gallery after we finished The Dark Awakens, there were two videos missing that claimed “specific conditions” needed to be met to unlock more story. We’re here to show you how to do that, and unlock the trophy called "Despair" in the meantime.

#IGN #Gaming #Tekken8

title: 7 Details You May Have Missed In the Dragon Ball Sparking! ZERO Trailer
description:
At only two minutes in length, the latest trailer for Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO is packed with all the Goku vs. Vegeta goodness you could expect from Dragon Ball. While at first glance the trailer is full of some of the Saiyan rival's greatest hits, there's still quite a few small details that may have instant-transmissioned on the screen, but that's ok because we’re here to help you spot everything. These are 7 details you may have missed in the latest Dragon Ball: Sparking ZERO trailer.

#IGN #Gaming #DragonBall

title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League Review
description:
Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League reviewed by Simon Cardy on PlayStation 5, also available on Xbox Series X/S and PC.

"Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League is a thoroughly frustrating game to play. There are things to enjoy here, with combat that’s snappy enough to carry it through a genuinely good DC comics story artfully dressed in high production values. But everything else just falls down around it. Engaging mission design is nearly non-existent, the looter-shooter mechanics are tired and dull, and the grotesquely-repetitive postgame leaves little-to-nothing to do of interest. The result is a bit of a mess that doesn't ever impress with any of its numerous ill-conceived ideas."

#IGN #Gaming #SuicideSquad

title: Death Of A Wish - Official Release Date Trailer
description:
Get another look at gameplay and the world of Death of a Wish, an upcoming action RPG set in a nightmare filled with horrifying monsters and terrifying people. Death of a Wish will be available on March 11, 2024.

In Death of a Wish, you play as Christian, a Marked child raised by a cult and struggling to escape indoctrination, as he bands with others to challenge their oppressors. By taking down the four Sanctum Faiths: Father, Sister, Cardinal, and Priest, they will upend the order of the world.

title: Call of Duty: Warzone and Modern Warfare 3 - Official Fortune's Keep Flythrough Trailer
description:
Amidst the scenic vistas, deadly secrets are waiting to be discovered between the cracks. Take a tour of Fortune's Keep in this latest trailer for Call of Duty: Warzone and Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3. The island has evolved. Fortune's Keep returns in Call of Duty: Warzone on February 7, 2024.

#IGN #Gaming #CallOfDuty

title: Palworld - The 5 Best Flying Mounts You Can Get
description:
The fastest and most efficient way to get around in Palworld is by mounting any flying Pal that you can make a saddle for. While the fastest Pal is essentially the early access version's final boss, there are other options out there that you can use in the meantime to travel more directly from place to place. Here are the 5 Best Flying Mounts in Palworld.

#IGN #Gaming #Palworld

title: Persona 3 Reload - Official Launch Trailer
description:
Dive into the Dark Hour and seal your fate. Check out the launch trailer for Persona 3 Reload for another look at the characters, combat, enemies, and more from this RPG remake. Persona 3 Reload is available now on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Windows PC, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Steam

#IGN #Gaming #Persona3Reload

title: Solar Opposites Valentine's Day Special - Exclusive Clip (2024) Dan Stevens, Thomas Middleditch
description: The Solar Opposites get romantic AF in their very first Valentine’s Day Special! An Earth Shatteringly Romantic Solar Valentine’s Day Opposites Special premieres on Hulu on February 5. Featuring the voices of Dan Stevens, Thomas Middleditch, Sean Giambrone, and Mary Mack, Solar Opposites is executive-produced by Mike McMahan and Josh Bycel. The series is produced by 20th Television Animation.

title: Dungeonborne - Official Gameplay Trailer
description:
Check out gameplay from Dungeonborne as skeletal enemies, treasure chest mimics, and more meet their demise via magic, blades, and other weapons in this latest trailer for the upcoming PvPvE extraction dungeon crawler game. A demo for Dungeonborne is available today, February 2 (10:00 PST/19:00 CET), until February 12 (10:00 PST/19:00 CET) on Steam as part of Steam Next Fest. The open alpha for Dungeonborne features seven player classes, including Rogue, Priest, Fighter, Cryomancer, Pyromancer, Swordmaster, and Death Knight. It will also feature the Sinner's End multiplayer map, the Clouseau Castle solo map, human and undead races, as well as character customization, and the Team Deathmatch mode called Arena.

#IGN #Gaming #Dungeonborne

title: How Long Is Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League?
description:
Traditionally, Rocksteady’s past Batman titles clocked in anywhere between 10 to 16 hours, but with Suicide Squad departing from the studios usual single-player traditions, for a live-service co-op experience, you might be left wondering “Just how long is it”? 

Here we’ll let you know how long it took different IGN team members to finish their adventure to Kill The Justice League, and what they prioritised during their time.

#SuicideSquad #DC #IGN

title: Demon Spore - Official Gameplay Deep-Dive
description: Check out 10 minutes of developer-led gameplay from Demon Spore, the upcoming '80s-tinged top-down twin-stick roguelite that has you trying to escape a genetic research lab where science has gone horribly wrong.

title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League - Which Character Should You Choose?
description:
Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League allows you to assemble a team of four super criminals to fight against the hordes of Brainiac's army and take on the Justice League themselves. Each character you can choose brings their own unique perks, skills, and traversal abilities to the table. Let’s dive in and find out which character’s style fits you!

#IGN #Gaming #SuicideSquad

title: PS5, Xbox Both Off to Good Starts in 2024 - Next-Gen Console Watch
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch. This week we’re discussing the recent PlayStation State of Play, and how great it is to see both the PS5 and Xbox Series X|S off to a strong start in 2024. However, Sony and Microsoft seem to have swapped strategies, as Xbox is relying heavily on first-party games, while PlayStation is letting their third-party partners shine this year. We also have poll results, and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com

#IGN #Xbox #PS5

title: Helldivers 2: The Final Preview
description: After playing Helldivers 2 for three hours, we're sold on the bold pivot from the original’s top-down view to the sequel’s new third-person perspective, the appetizing roster of deadly gadgets, and the outrageous comedic tone that expertly channels the low-budget action film vibes. Previewed on PC by Travis Northup.

title: Have you ever heard SpongeBob say the words “Super Bowl”? #sb58 #spongebob #nick #tomkenny #sblviii
Judas is a sci-fi action game from the creator of BioShock Ken Levine. #judas #bioshock #gaming
Nintendo Power Up drinks with edible glitter at Universal Studios Hollywood! #nintendo #universal
In the Land of Saints and Sinners - Official Trailer (2024) Liam Neeson
description: Ireland, 1970s. Eager to leave his dark past behind, Finbar Murphy (Liam Neeson) leads a quiet life in the remote coastal town of Glencolmcille, far from the political violence that grips the rest of the country. But when a menacing crew of terrorists arrive, led by a ruthless woman named Doirean (Kerry Condon), Finbar is drawn into an increasingly vicious game of cat and mouse, forcing him to choose between exposing his secret identity or defending his friends and neighbors.

title: Netflix - Official The Series & Films Preview 2024 Trailer
description:
Get a peek at various films and series coming to Netflix in 2024, including the return of Squid Game, Bridgerton, The Diplomat, Umbrella Academy, Rebel Moon, and Beverly Hills Cop. The trailer also showcases new shows and movies like 3 Body Problem, Avatar, Back in Action, and Atlas.

#ign #netflix

title: The NEW Fortnite Festival wireless guitar: The Riffmaster for PS4/PS5 and Xbox One/Series X/S!
Phantom Blade Zero: Official Anime Trailer + Gameplay Teaser
description:
Enjoy this anime trailer – which is essentially a flashback to S-Game's first game, 2008's Rainblood, and also set just before the events of Phantom Blade Zero – along with a bonus bit of Phantom Blade Zero's third-person action-RPG gameplay footage at the end.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Avowed Devs Explain Why There Won't Be Romance Options - IGN Daily Fix
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The highly anticipated RPG, Avowed, won't be featuring a particular trope of the genre, and the game's director explains why. In other news, Resident Evil 4 is getting another release (no, it's not a remaster of the remake, relax) which will certainly add to its already impressive sales numbers. And finally, Metro fans will have to wait even longer for the next mainline installment, as the recently anounced Metro Awakening VR is revealed to be a spinoff.

title: Serum - Official 5 Reasons to Play Trailer
description:
Watch the latest trailer for Serum to learn more about the upcoming first-person survival adventure game. The trailer showcases the world and story of Serum, some of the enemies you'll encounter, weapon crafting, and the online multiplayer mode. Serum is heading to Early Access on PC, and a demo is available from February 5 on Steam as part of Steam Next Fest.

In Serum, the mysterious elixir (serum) is essential to your survival, a lifeline that has a curing effect of the Blight, a man-made catastrophic event that has left the world in ruin. Discover how this vital liquid can prolong your existence, amplify abilities, and enhance a hand-crafted arsenal of weaponry. But beware, time is of the essence, and the clock is ticking. You need to craft different kinds of serum to survive, fight dangerous mutated creatures, solve intriguing puzzles and ultimately escape the dangers you find yourself immersed in... or die trying.

#IGN #Gaming
